name: tables
title: Tables
note: This is standard html <table> markup. Please see options below on what classes can be used for styling.

options.name: .table-border
options.description: Adds borders on all sides of the table and cells.

options.name: .table-hover
options.description: To enable a hover state on table rows within a <tbody>.

options.name: .table-sm
options.description: To make tables more compact by cutting cell padding in half.

options.name: .table-responsive
options.description: To make them scroll horizontally on small devices (under 768px). When viewing on anything larger than 768px wide, you will not see any difference in these tables.

options.name: .table-striped
options.description: Adds zebra-striping to any table row within the <tbody>.
